title: About Me
subtitle: Passionate Developer with a Mission
description: I'm a dedicated Full Stack Web Developer with expertise in building modern, scalable web applications. My journey in web development started with a passion for creating solutions that make a difference. I specialize in the MERN stack and have a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies.
highlight: I believe in writing clean, maintainable code and creating user experiences that are both beautiful and functional.
